citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm on August
23, 2021.
Upon arrival, the licensee was contacted by phone, stating no one was available for an inspection. The earliest availability
for a facility representative would be hours later at minimum.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm on August 
23, 2021. 
 
Upon arrival, the licensee was contacted by phone, stating no one was available for an inspection. The earliest availability 
for a facility representative would be hours later at minimum. 
 
 
 
End Section
